title: Erika Heynatz reveals how she juggles motherhood and her career
text:
Erika Heynatz has revealed how she juggles motherhood and her career.

The 44-year-old former Home and Away star and model admitted that there's 'no secret' to doing it all.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia at the opening night of Cirque du Soleil's Kurios in Sydney last week, Erika said: 'It takes a village.'

'It takes a village': Former Home and Away star Erika Heynatz reveals how she juggles motherhood and her career... and admits there's 'no secret' to doing it all

Erika enjoyed a date night with husband Andrew Kingston at the event, who she shares son Charlie, three, with.

'It takes a village, it always does,' Erika said.

'We're really lucky we've got family close by and also we take turns, when we want to go out do things, we just swap it over. Fair's fair.'

'We're really lucky we've got family close by and also we take turns, when we want to go out do things, we just swap it over. Fair's fair': said as she enjoyed a date night with her husband, Andrew Kingston, at the opening night of Cirque du Soleil's Kurios in Sydney last week

Her boy: Eriksa is mother to son Charlie, three

Erika appeared on Home and Away for a year in 2015 and previously enjoyed an illustrious career as a fashion model.

Andrew and Erika married in 2007, and in March this year celebrated twelve years together.

The pair enjoyed a day out at Palm Beach together and Erika took to Instagram at the time to gush over her man.

'Twelve years walking through life's greatest adventures with Kingo,' she wrote.

She added: 'Ain't love grand?'

'Anniversary morning spent on a visit to Whale Beach where we got married and a stormy stroll along Palm Beach towards the lighthouse after breakfast. Happy Days.'
description: Erika Heynatz has revealed how she juggles motherhood and her career.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
